High season is July and August . What’s included? You can book this itinerary as a complete package through Switzerland Travel Centre. If you’d rather not plan every detail yourself, the following services are included: 1 overnight stay in a 3-star hotel with breakfast in each of: Zurich, St. Gallen, St. Moritz, Lugano, Zermatt, Lausanne, Interlaken and Lucerne Zürich
